name: If On A Winter's Night, Four Travelers
summary: If On A Winter's Night, Four Travelers is a narrative-driven point-and-click adventure that explores the stories of four different characters in a masked ball taking place on a train in the late 1920s.
info:
• 中文名: 如果在冬夜，四个旅人
  • 平台: PC
  • 游玩人数: 1
  • 发行日期: 2021-03-10
  • 开发: Laura Hunt
  • 剧本: Laura Hunt
  • 音乐: Laura Hunt
  • 原画: Thomas Möhring
  • 官方网站: https://laurahunt.itch.io/if-on-a-winters-night-four-travelers
